name: Cowork
description: Turn Claude into your digital coworker. An agentic AI assistant by Anthropic that extends Claude Code's capabilities beyond programming to handle everyday office tasks and document editing autonomously.

name: 1Code
description: Open source Cursor-like UI for Claude Code. Provides a better user interface for running code agents in parallel, with keyboard-first UI, hotkeys for every action, and support for plan mode and skills.

name: remio 2.0
description: Captures your work to build a searchable knowledge base. An AI-powered tool that automatically identifies and saves valuable content from web pages and local files, creating a context-aware knowledge base for developers with project-long memory.

name: Vellum
description: Build AI agents using plain English to do your boring tasks. A text-to-agent builder platform that allows users to create production-ready AI agents for workflow orchestration simply by describing tasks in natural language.

name: Sled
description: Run your coding agent from your phone, with voice. A voice interface for Claude Code that lets developers continue working with their AI coding agent even when away from their desk through secure voice commands.
community_quotes: You can now code while walking your dog

name: AI Test Engineer by BlinqIO
description: Playwright code + self-healing tests with no vendor lock-in. An AI-powered tool focused specifically on test generation and maintenance workflow for developers, automating the debugging workflow.

name: Repo Prompt
description: Automate assembling the perfect context for your project. Analyzes your codebase and intelligently selects the most relevant files to provide context to AI coding assistants, reducing token waste and AI hallucinations by maintaining project context awareness.

name: Spec Coding by Capacity
description: Vibe Coding with a planning assistant to build with clarity. A spec-driven development tool for vibe coders that brings structure to AI-native software development workflows through planning assistance.

name: Phoenix CLI
description: Terminal access for AI coding and agent debugging. Provides terminal-first interface for AI coding assistants with agent debugging and observability capabilities, enabling CLI-based agent management.
